TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit VisualStyleElement extends System.Object

summary.span: 識別使用視覺化樣式繪製的控制項或使用者介面 (UI) 項目。

span.span: Identifies a control or user interface (UI) element that is drawn with visual styles.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 類別識別的 Windows 控制項或使用者介面 (UI) 項目由目前作業系統的視覺化樣式所定義。The class identifies a Windows control or user interface (UI) element that is defined by the current visual style of the operating system. 視覺化樣式項目定義的*類別*，*一部分*，和*狀態*:A visual style element is defined in terms of *class*, *part*, and *state*: - *類別*識別一組相關的視覺化樣式項目，通常會繪製在一起。The *class* identifies a group of related visual style elements that are typically drawn together. 所指定的類別屬性。The class is specified by the property. - *一部分*定義個別成員的類別。The *part* defines a discrete member of a class. 組件由指定屬性。The part is specified by the property. - *狀態*描述類別和組件所定義之項目的目前可見狀態。The *state* describes the current visual state of the element defined by the class and part. 狀態由指定屬性。The state is specified by the property. 命名空間會公開數百個物件，表示控制項和使用者介面可以視覺化樣式所定義的項目。The namespace exposes hundreds of objects that represent the controls and user interface elements that can be defined by a visual style. 這些物件會公開為`static`巢狀類別的屬性。These objects are exposed as `static` properties of nested classes of . 每一個屬性，在主控類別的限定的名稱表示類別和影像的繪製的項目，而屬性名稱表示的項目狀態。For each property, the qualified name of the owning class represents the class and the part of the drawn element, and the property name represents the state of the element. 例如，屬性會傳回，可以用來繪製按鈕狀態為 pressed 使用視覺化樣式。For example, the property returns a that can be used to draw a button in the pressed state with visual styles. `Pressed`屬性名稱會對應至狀態`PushButton`對應至組件，以及`Button`識別視覺化樣式項目類別。The `Pressed` property name corresponds to the state, `PushButton` corresponds to the part, and `Button` identifies the class of the visual style element. 若要繪製的視覺化樣式項目，建立，將它設定為您想要繪製，然後再呼叫方法。To draw a visual style element, create a , set it to the you wish to draw, and then call the method. 若要判斷目前的視覺化樣式是否提供特定項目的定義，請呼叫與項目做為引數的方法。To determine whether the current visual style provides a definition for a particular element, call the method with the element as the argument. 和換行的視覺化樣式應用程式開發介面，從 Windows Platform SDK Windows Shell 部分功能。 and wrap the functionality of the visual styles API from the Windows Shell portion of the Windows Platform SDK. 多個視覺化樣式的詳細資訊，請參閱 「 使用 Windows XP 視覺化樣式 」，在 MSDN Library 的 Platform SDK 部分[ http://msdn.microsoft.com/library ](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/)。For more information on visual styles, see "Using Windows XP Visual Styles" in the Platform SDK portion of the MSDN Library at [http://msdn.microsoft.com/library](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/). ## Examples 下列程式碼範例是完整的應用程式，提供瀏覽和繪圖的所有 UI物件所公開命名空間。The following code example is a complete application that provides a UI for browsing and drawing all of the objects exposed by the namespace. 若要檢視項目，請使用控制項來巡覽至節點，表示您想要繪製，然後按一下節點之項目的狀態視窗的左邊。To view an element, use the control on the left side of the window to navigate to the node that represents the state of the element you want to draw, and then click the node. 只有當目前的視覺化樣式所定義的項目，這個範例會繪製所選取的項目。This sample will draw the selected element only if the element is defined by the current visual style. [!code-cpp[System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleElement#0](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleElement/cpp/form1.cpp#0)] [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleElement#0](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleElement/CS/form1.cs#0)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleElement#0](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleElement/VB/form1.vb#0)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property ClassName As String
public: property System::String ^ ClassName { System::String ^ get(); };

summary.span: 取得這個 所代表的視覺化樣式項目之類別名稱。

span.span: Gets the class name of the visual style element that this represents.

value.span: 字串，表示視覺化樣式項目的類別名稱。

span.span: A string that represents the class name of a visual style element.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 類別名稱是指一組相關的視覺化樣式項目，通常會繪製在一起。A class name refers to a group of related visual style elements that are typically drawn together. 類別名稱可以對應至控制項，例如"SCROLLBAR"和"TRACKBAR"，但類別名稱也可以指一組未對應到特定的控制項，例如"EXPLORERBAR"和"STARTPANEL"的項目。A class name can correspond to a control, such as "SCROLLBAR" and "TRACKBAR", but a class name can also refer to a group of elements that do not correspond to a particular control, such as "EXPLORERBAR" and "STARTPANEL". 視覺化樣式類別、 組件和狀態的詳細資訊，請參閱 「 組件和狀態 」，在 Windows 殼層文件中[ http://msdn.microsoft.com/library ](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library)。For more information on visual style classes, parts, and states, see "Parts and States" in the Windows Shell documentation at [http://msdn.microsoft.com/library](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library).

span.span: A value that represents the state of the visual style element to be created.

summary.span: 從指定的類別、組件和狀態值，建立新的視覺化樣式項目。

span.span: Creates a new visual style element from the specified class, part, and state values.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property Part As Integer
public: property int Part { int get(); };

summary.span: 取得值，表示這個 所代表的視覺化樣式項目之部分。

span.span: Gets a value indicating the part of the visual style element that this represents.

value.span: 值，表示視覺化樣式項目的組件。

span.span: A value that represents the part of a visual style element.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 有一部分是離散的視覺化樣式項目類別的成員。A part is a discrete member of a class of visual style elements. 比方說，代表核取方塊、 選項按鈕和按鈕的視覺化樣式項目會視為的部分 「 按鈕 」 類別。For example, visual style elements that represent a check box, radio button, and push button are all considered parts of the "BUTTON" class. 部分值是介於 1 至為特定類別所定義的部分數目的整數。Part values are integers that range from 1 to the number of parts defined for a particular class. 視覺化樣式類別、 組件和狀態的詳細資訊，請參閱 「 組件和狀態 」，在 Windows 殼層文件中[ http://msdn.microsoft.com/library ](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library)。For more information on visual style classes, parts, and states, see "Parts and States" in the Windows Shell documentation at [http://msdn.microsoft.com/library](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library).

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property State As Integer
public: property int State { int get(); };

summary.span: 取得值，表示這個 所代表的視覺化樣式項目狀態。

span.span: Gets a value indicating the state of the visual style element that this represents.

value.span: 值，表示視覺化樣式項目的狀態。

span.span: A value that represents the state of a visual style element.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 視覺化樣式的組件可以有一或多個視覺狀態。A visual style part can have one or more visual states. 例如，代表選項按鈕的視覺化樣式項目可以是已停用、 選取或取消核取狀態。For example, a visual style element that represents a radio button can be in the disabled, checked, or unchecked state. 狀態值是整數，範圍從 1 到定義的特定部分的狀態數目。State values are integers that range from 1 to the number of states defined for a particular part. 如需有關視覺化樣式類別、 組件和狀態的詳細資訊，請參閱 「 組件和狀態 」 中的 Windows Shell 文件位於[ http://msdn.microsoft.com/library ](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library)。For more information on visual style classes, parts, and states, see "Parts and States" in the Windows Shell documentation located at [http://msdn.microsoft.com/library](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library).
